view

Interface Pinterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleWorld

    public interface Pinterface
    For uses with the iProjector, which calls this method before Projecting. In a class implementing this, the iUpdate should contain any calculations required for updating the Image/Slide, of iProjector.
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void iUpdate(java.awt.image.BufferedImage ISlide)
      Override this in an object that you want to receive updates from the projector.

    • Method Detail

      • iUpdate

        Override this in an object that you want to receive updates from the projector.
        Parameters:
        ISlide -
